item.title: Quickly calculate folder size on Windows platform
item.description:
What to do? With many disks and files, the system’s built-in File Explorer is too slow when trying to calculate folder sizes, making you want to give up

Everything

You should also have heard of it from friends. Its search speed far surpasses the system’s built-in File Explorer. Since the system supports fast file indexing, there must be similar tools available that can establish a file index and simultaneously calculate file sizes.

WizTree

Website: https://www.diskanalyzer.com/

Extract and run the standard installation or green version

Fast speed, diverse data display types â€“ a tree diagram on the left, file types on the right, and graphical visualizations in the software’s bottom bar

SpaceSniffer (no longer maintained as of update 2023)

Software website: http://www.uderzo.it/main_products/space_sniffer/

The operation is simple: select the corresponding disk, and the software will graphically display folder sizes. Larger volumes correspond to larger matrices in the image. Other operations are self-explanatory with a few clicks. It supports filtering files by input conditions.

  • File size filtering
  • File date filtering
